name: A Day At The Park
description:
This game is a submission to the Wholesome game jam.

A day at the park is a game about you trying to help your village out.

Complete tasks to increse the Comunity bar, if its al of the way full, you win.

This is a early prototype.

There is only 1 mission, not cause the code does not work, there was no time left

controls:

Move: WASD or a controllers Right joystick

Interact: Space or a controllers West button

This game was made by NLesnier, f1nn26, Cornhiper and speed.

Shadow members: lighten and a friend of Cornhiper
